sections.description: A category-based, GDPR-compliant cookie consent banner with tracking integrations and cookie discovery.
sections.changelog:
2.3.1

  • Security: Fixed SQL injection risk with prepared statements.
  • Security: Fixed XSS in admin summary (uses textContent).
  • Security: Improved IP detection behind reverse proxies (Cloudflare, nginx).
  • Fix: Cookie discovery now works with page caching plugins.
  • Fix: Removed jQuery dependency for Matomo consent.
  • GDPR: Added consent expiry after 365 days.
  • Performance: Added minified JavaScript (63% smaller).
  • Added uninstall cleanup handler.
